title: Cover, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Foundation: plain weave with cutwork. Cover has embroidery and cut work.  Cut work has needle lace fillings.  Embroidery stitches are stem, buttonhole, single chain loop, satin, star, French knots, "attached looping", herringbone.
description: Small cover with horizontal and vertically symmetrical pattern encorporating small plants embroidered in tan linen with large shapes in cut fabric work with needle made fillings (overcast loop stitch). Needle made (overcast loop stitch) outer edging made directly on foundation fabric.  Two coral looped knot-like stitches and herringbone stitches on two parallel rows of buttonhole stitching.

tombstone.epitaph:
